content: It is not necessary. You would get the newest features, as TB would update every six weeks or so. You'll still get security updates and bug fixes if you don't update. One reason not to update is that some add-ons may not work until they are updated.
creator: siffemoz

creator: siffemoz

content:
Perhaps you saw the invitation "Upgrade to Thunderbird Release" that I have attached?

You get to choose whether to upgrade or not. See https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/choosing-thunderbird-release-channel/ and https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/thunderbird-release for more information.
creator: wsmwk

content: Sorry. Where do I find the "program directory" and how do I reinstall? Thanks
creator: rminnon

content: The location will be either "c:\Program Files\Mozilla Thunderbird” or c:\Program Files (x86)\Mozilla Thunderbird”
creator: wsmwk
